#id=1
#text=I was hosting a party and needed to pick up some groceries for my guests .
#id=2
#text=I started by making a list of all the food I needed to buy .
#id=3
#text=Then I grabbed my reusable shopping bags and drove to the grocery store .
#id=4
#text=I chose a cart from outside and picked up a copy of the grocery store ad from the front of the store .
#id=5
#text=I walked through all the aisles pushing my cart .
#id=6
#text=I picked out the food I needed from my list , making sure to choose food that was on sale or generic food .
#id=7
#text=When I had checked everything off on my list , I got in line at the store checkouts .
#id=8
#text=There was a friendly cashier who scanned all of my groceries and told me how much money it cost .
#id=9
#text=There was also a friendly bagger who put all on my groceries in my bags .
#text=At the end , the bagger offered to help put all of my groceries in the cart .
#text=As I left the parking lot , I waved goodbye to him after my successful trip .
